CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1959, pg. 3 reads: "Mother Arrested - Mrs. Laverne Dupree was held on neglect charges by Braddock Police Chief E. Goldstein, because of her absence from home when fire destroyed her sons, Keith, 2 (inset); Clifford, 4, and William, 5."
TitMainTitle: Braddock police chief E. Goldstein escorting Laverne Dupree into office for arraignment on child neglect charges
